experience.title: Senior Executive Human Resources
experience.description: ‚óè  Handling Senior to Junior level profiles ‚Äì Both Technical and Non-Technical, and managingthe entire US technical profiles.‚óè  Non - Technical profile handling: Content writers, Social Media managers, Senior HR Recruiter, Admin Managers, Communication Managers, L& D Managers, Company Secretary, Warehouse Managers, Inventory Managers, Store Incharge, HR Recruiter. ‚óè  Technical profile handling: Magento front-end and back-end developer, Quality Assurance, Dot Net Developer, PHP Developer, UI Developer, Web designer, Java Developers, Salesforce Developer. ‚óè Coordinating directly with the top management related to vacancies.‚óè Sourcing Profiles using Job Portals (Naukri, Indeed, LinkedIn Recruiter, other social media).‚óè Conduct the 1st first round of interview (telephonic & zoom meeting) to judge if the candidate would be suitable for the position or not. Keep track of interview feedback from the seniors. Follow up with the manager if there is a delay in the feedback either by call or through mails.‚óè Interview finalization and to keep a track on selected candidates with joining date.
